{{Wired embedded system |brand=Synology |model=DiskStation |revision=DS412+ |asin=B007JLE84C |est_release_date=03/12/2012 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |type=NAS |fcc_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=8.33 |cpu1_brand=Intel Atom |cpu1_model=D2700 |cpu1_cspeed=2.13 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0C |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Kingston |ram1_model=DDR3 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Intel |eth_chip1_model=WG82574L |eth_chip2_brand=Intel |eth_chip2_model=WG82574L |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=Link Aggregation |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|4-Bay Diskless Network Attached Storage (DS412+)}} :[http://www.synology.com/products/product.php?product_name=DS412%2B&lang=us Product page] {{•}} [https://www.synology.com/ru-ru/support/download/DS412+ Support page]
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] D2700 (Dual Core) @2.13GHz *RAM Memory: 1GB DDR3 (SoDIMM) (expandable to 3GB) :Compatible with SoDIMM DDR3-1333 PC3-10600 CL9 timing of 9-9-9 :Manually upgradeable e.g. to Kingston value RAM KVR1333D3S8S9 ([https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xoBHXC_shHk 2G]) *Drive Type: 3.5" SATA HDD, 2.5" SATA HDD, 2.5" SATA SSD *Max Internal Capacity: 16TB (4x 4TB HDD) *External HDD Interface: 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0, 1x eSATA *LAN: 2x GbE ports (2x [[Intel]] WG82574L)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/31909-synology-ds412-diskstation-reviewed ''Synology DiskStation DS412+'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: [[Intel Atom]] D2700 @2.13GHz :Flash: 128MB DOM ([[Samsung]] K9F1G08U0C) ::''USBest'' UT165-L46 (Controller) :RAM: 1GB DDR3 SoDIMM (expandable to 3GB) :Southbridge: [[Intel]] 82801JIR (ICH10R) :eSATA: ''[[Silicon Image]]'' Sil3531 PCIe (1x)/eSATA ::''[[Silicon Image]]'' Sil3132 PCIe (1x) (rear eSATA) :USB 3.0: 2x ports; [[NEC]] D720200AF (USB 3.0 Controller) :USB 2.0: 1x port; I/O: ''ITE'' IT8728F :Ethernet: 2x GbE ports (2x [[Intel]] WG82574L) :uC: [[Microchip]] PIC16F883 (8-bit Microcontroller)
===See also=== :[[List of NAS Devices]] *[[Synology DiskStation DS415+]] • [https://www.synology.com/en-global/products/DS415+ PPage] :ASIN: [http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00IKTSSIO?tag=wiki085-20 B00IKTSSIO] (02/21/2014) :CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2538 Quad Core @2.4GHz <!-- ::(w/ AES-NI HW Encryption Engine) --> :Flash: 128MB (NAND); RAM Memory: 2GB (DDR3) :Drive Bays: 4x 3.5"/2.5" HDD/SSD (SATA) :External Ports: 1x USB 2.0, 2x USB 3.0, 1x eSATA Port :LAN: 2x GbE (w/ Failover and Link Aggregation Support)
